name: Club
mastery: Slow - If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can reduce its speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn. (Multiple hits don’t stack additional slowdown beyond 10 feet.)

name: Dagger
mastery: Nick - When engaging in two-weapon fighting, you can make the off-hand extra attack as part of the Attack action instead of as a Bonus Action. (You still only get one extra attack per turn.) This makes dual-wielding more fluid.

name: Greatclub
mastery: Push - If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can push the creature up to 10 feet straight away from you, provided it is Large or smaller.

name: Handaxe
mastery: Vex - If you hit a creature with this weapon, you have advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before the end of your next turn. (This encourages focusing on one target by exploiting a weak spot.)

name: Javelin
mastery: Slow - On a hit, you can reduce the target’s speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn (as with the Slow property.

name: Light Hammer
mastery: Nick - When dual-wielding Light hammers, you can make the off-hand attack as part of the Attack action instead of using your Bonus Action (similar to Dagger’s mastery.

name: Mace
mastery: Sap - If you hit a creature with this weapon, that creature has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn. (A concussive blow makes it less effective at striking back.)

name: Sickle
mastery: Nick - (See Dagger.) The sickle’s mastery allows the off-hand extra attack to be made as part of the Attack action once per turn.

name: Spear
mastery: Sap - On a hit, the target has disadvantage on its next attack roll until your next turn (the spear’s jab rattles the foe).

name: Light Crossbow
mastery: Slow - If you hit, you reduce the target’s speed by 10 feet until the start of your next ture. (A well-placed bolt hinders movement.)

name: Shortbow
mastery: Vex - Hitting a creature grants you advantage on your next attack roll against that same creature before end of your next turn.

name: Sling
mastery: Slow - A struck target’s speed is lowered by 10 feet until the start of your next turn (the sling stone momentarily disorients the target.

name: Battleaxe
mastery: Topple - If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can force it to make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8 + your attack mod + Prof). On a failure, it falls prone. (The battleaxe can knock foes off their feet.)

name: Flail
mastery: Sap - A hit from a flail imposes disadvantage on the target’s next attack roll before the start of your next turn. (The chain of the flail throws off the enemy’s balance.)

name: Glaive
mastery: Graze - When you miss a creature with this weapon, you still deal damage equal to your ability modifier used for the attack (the target takes a grazing wound). This property only applies if the attack miss was within normal reach/range.

name: Greataxe
mastery: Cleave - If you hit a creature with a melee attack using this weapon, you can immediately make another attack with the greataxe against a different creature within 5 feet of the original target and within your react. This extra attack can only be made once per turn and does not add your ability mod to damage.

name: Greatsword
mastery: Graze - If you miss with a greatsword attack, you still deal damage to the target equal to your Strength modifier (minimum 0). Your wide swing clips the foe even on a miss.

name: Halberd
mastery: Cleave - On a hit, you can make an additional melee attack with the halberd against a second creature within 5 feet of the first target (and within your reach). This secondary attack, once per turn, deals normal weapon damage but without adding your ability modifier.

name: Lance
mastery: Topple - A lance strike can unhorse foes. On hit, you can force a CON save (DC = 8 + attack mod + Prof) or knock the target prone. (Lances are unwieldy to use on foot; special: disadvantage to attack targets within 5 feet.)

name: Longsword
mastery: Sap - A precise slash causes the target to falter. A creature hit by a longsword has disadvantage on its next attack roll before your next turn.

name: Maul
mastery: Topple - The crushing force of a maul can knock foes down. On a hit, you may force a CON save (DC 8 + mod + Prof) or the target falls prone.

name: Morningstar
mastery: Sap - The spiked head of the morningstar disrupts enemies. On a hit, target has disadvantage on its next attack roll until the start of your next turn.

name: Pike
mastery: Push - A pike thrust can drive enemies back. On hit, you can push a Large or smaller creature up to 10 feet away from you.

name: Rapier
mastery: Vex - A rapier’s precise strike marks a foe. When you hit, you have advantage on your next attack against that creature before end of your next turn.

name: Scimitar
mastery: Nick - Nimble scimitar fighting lets you make your off-hand attack as part of the Attack action (once per turn) instead of using a Bonus Action, when fighting with two light weapon.

name: Shortsword
mastery: Vex - Striking with a shortsword grants you advantage on your next attack against the same target before your next turn.

name: Trident
mastery: Topple - A solid hit can knock the wind out of foes. On a hit, you may force a CON save (DC based on attack) or knock the target prone (as with other Topple weapons.

name: War Pick
mastery: Sap - The war pick’s puncturing strike imposes disadvantage on the target’s next attack roll until the start of your next turn (like other Sap weapons.

name: Warhammer
mastery: Push - A powerful blow can shove a foe back. On hit, you can push a Large or smaller creature up to 10 feet away.

name: Whip
mastery: Slow - The lash of a whip entangles briefly. A creature hit by a whip has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

name: Blowgun
mastery: Vex - A hit from a blowgun dart marks a target. You have advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before end of your next turn (assuming the creature is affected by the hit, often used with poison.

name: Crossbow, Hand
mastery: Vex - A well-placed hand crossbow bolt grants you advantage on your next attack against that target before end of next turn.

name: Crossbow, Heavy
mastery: Push - The impact of a heavy bolt can knock foes back 10 feet on a hit (Large or smaller creatures).

name: Longbow
mastery: Slow - A struck target’s movement is hindered, reducing its speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

name: Musket
mastery: Slow - The concussive shot from a musket slows the target by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

name: Pistol
mastery: Vex - A bullet from a pistol marks the target, granting advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before end of your next turn.
